about_the_game:
The United 1944 Multiplayer DEMO is a gameplay experience of the full game. Try out all the maps, game modes, the allies weapon families, the 40+ skills of the game, weekly quests and access to all servers for free! All progress made in the DEMO carries over to the paid version.

UPGRADE TO THE FULL VERSION

Buy the game to keep all the progress made in the DEMO into the full game. By buying it, you will get access to:
  • 32 different player statistics view, all your statistics from the DEMO are being stored so you will get them!
  • A Profile Card with 54 elements to personalize it with Badges, statistics, titles and decorations to showcase to your allies or enemies!
  • Access to 11 extra weapons from the German and soviet army.
  • Access to 2 extra knifes.
  • Access to 2 extra hammers.
  • Access to 2 extra backpacks.
  • Access to 4 weapon charms.
  • Access to 96 cosmetics for Weapons, Knifes, backpacks and hammers.
  • Access to player customization with 3 new outfits and more than 16 variants to customize your outfit.
  • Access to the server Browser for the Domination and Survivor Game mode.
  • You will be able to spend all your dog tags and redeem all your progress unlocked!

content_descriptors.notes: The game is a World War 2 shooter with realistic visuals, including gunfights, explosions, and death. The game is not excessively gory, but it depicts typical war situations.

name: United 1944 Multiplayer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: UNITED 1944 is an innovative WWII shooter combining weapon crafting, base building, and team strategy. Fight for territory in 16v16 urban guerrilla battles in Domination Mode, or explore a city in ruins as a lone wolf in Survivor. Unlock skills and customize your hero. Play your way. Make history.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
